alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 09 at 7:00PM MST until August 09 at 8:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Southeast Arizona, including the following counties, Cochise and Graham. * WHEN...Until 900 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 700 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bowie. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
